WRITING.TEXT: American Pie (pretty much all of them), The Shining, American Mary
Weed. I told myself I'd never touch the stuff, but then I did and it was awesome. I'm by no means a stoner (I smoke on occasion when I'm with friends) but daaaaamn. I was missing out!
The Dayman song from It's Always Sunny always makes me grin.
"Wait a second, is Passover a Jewish holiday or a Persian holiday?" My dad was disappointed in me (he is Jewish and my mom and I are semi-practicing Catholics). I said this yesterday.
American Mary

I made an observation the other night. I was totally fine with the extreme gore in the movie I was watching (Evil Dead 2013), but then I saw a flying bug in my room and screamed and booked it into the hallway. So flying bugs.

WRITING.TITLE: My lovely middle school scene phase

WRITING.TEXT: He had to pay like $80,000 and it ended up being ruled out as a misdemeanor. They almost made it a felony charge because of the amount of damage, but the team on the case decided that they didn't want there to be a whole media uproar, so they went with misdemeanor.
The 10th doctor. Mmmmmmm.
Have you listened to their song "Get Crunk"? ...Don't.
Saw them at Warped Tour 2011 when I went through that phase. I started to reconsider my life after that day.
Saw them at Warped in 2011. The 2 guys made out onstage and then one of them (whose name is Dahvie, I think) started telling a girl who was probably like 15 to "shake that ass."

Probably not the best, but these are my top 3 favorites: Haim - [The Wire](https://youtu.be/1TffpkE2GU4), GaIn - [Paradise Lost](https://youtu.be/4i32ANEa5mk), and OK Go - [I Won't Let You Down](https://youtu.be/u1ZB_rGFyeU).

My dad was fighting against Justin Bieber in the case where he egged his neighbor's house and caused $80,000-worth of damage. My dad's usually a lawyer for families of murder victims and stuff, so this was certainly different.
A kid who was in my 6th period (who's a junior) started jacking off in the middle of class once. I sat right next to him too. He's not in the class anymore...
I had an emo/scene phase. I have [pictures](http://imgur.com/0xF631o).
The Greatet Generation by The Wonder Years, The 2nd Law by Muse, Youth by Citizen, Foot In Mouth Disease by Gob, What Are You So Scared Of? by Tonight Alive
What is the most accurate way to measure the circumference of a penis?
I saw Jackass 3D in theaters with my dad when I was like 13 for some reason.

Anorexia nervosa isn't only not eating. That could be due to depression, anxiety, eating disorders categorized into EDNOS/OSFED, etc. I was checking the physical and emotional symptoms: hair loss, lanugo growth, dizziness/lightheadedness fainting, loss of or irregular periods, low blood pressure, racing or slow resting heart rate, fatigue, headaches, dehydration, fear of gaining weight, fear of certain foods, etc. Anorexia nervosa is so much more than just simply "not eating." Anorexia (and all eating disorders) are the most fatal compared to any other mental illness. Also, anorexia has a strict criteria to be diagnosed.
Well in terms of the mental illness, no. But anorexia is a medical term for loss of appetite due to other problems, but it's rarely used.
I can lick my elbow.

I took so many quizzes and read so much stuff about all my symptoms. Every single thing I looked at said that I had or was at serious risk for anorexia nervosa. I knew I had an eating disorder, but I didn't think it was so serious. Turned out the online diagnosis was right. I found out when I had to go to the ER after nearly collapsing due to dehydration, low blood sugar, electrolyte imbalance, and lack of food intake. So the lesson is that if you really match the symptoms to something online, go see your doctor. And just so you all know, I'm currently in treatment and pretty stable.
A bakery that only cooks foods in the shape of genitalia. That's it. Nothing else. I'm sure that already exists, but I'd still do it. Maybe put it in West Hollywood...
A SLIDE, DUH! (I'm a child at heart)
I'd use it to go back and actually pay attention to the little snippet of information I missed. This would save me from a lot of awkward situations and questions...
